## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                   | Type                       | Default       |
| ---------- | ---------- | ----------------------------- | -------------------------- | ------------- |
| `color`    | `color`    | The button color              | `"primary" \| "secondary"` | `'primary'`   |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Disabled state for the button | `boolean`                  | `false`       |
| `variant`  | `variant`  | The button variant            | `"outline" \| "principal"` | `'principal'` |
